item.title: Command bindings
item.description: Catel will automatically hook up the CanExecute of the command to the Enabled property of the element it is bound to. A command binding is always bound to an event of a specific element as shown below. Android protected override void AddBindings(BindingContext bindingContext, IViewModel viewModel) { var vm = (MainViewModel) viewModel; bindingContext.AddCommandBinding(_testButton, "Click", vm.RunCommand); } iOS iOS not yet documented

item.title: Property bindings
item.description: Property bindings are very important in the MVVM pattern. The binding system in Catel will automatically map properties when the binding system is used. Binding properties one way To bind properties one way, use the code below. Android protected override void AddBindings(BindingContext bindingContext, IViewModel viewModel) { var vm = (MainViewModel) viewModel; bindingContext.AddBinding(() => vm.FirstName, () => _firstNameEditText.Text, BindingMode.OneWay); } iOS iOS not yet documented Binding properties two way To bind properties two way, use the code below.
